translation.en: HE WANTS TO KNOW WHAT'S HAPPENING TO HIS DEAL.
translation.ko: 제럴드 테이트가 와서 어떻게 된 건지 묻네요

translation.en: - GO GET HARVEY.
- TRUST ME, I CAN HANDLE GERALD TATE.
translation.ko: 믿어주세요, 제럴드 테이트는 저도 상대할 수 있어요

translation.en: - I'M SORRY, YOU SAY THE BET'S TO ME?
- HARVEY, WHEN ARE YOU GONNA LEAVE PEARSON AND WORK FOR A MAN?
translation.ko: 하비, 언제 피어슨을 떠나 우리 회사로 올 거지?

translation.en: - I'LL LEAVE JESSICA ANYTIME YOU WANT. YOU JUST HAVE TO FORMALLY ASK.
THEN, AFTER THAT, WHY DON'T YOU FORMALLY ASK SANTA CLAUS TO BRING YOU A PONY,
'CAUSE I'M NOT LEAVING JESSICA. I CHECK.
- RAISE. FIVE THOUSAND.
- I'M ALL-IN.
YOU CAN PAY ME LATER. I GOT TO GO.
translation.ko: 계산은 나중에 하세요 급한 일이 있어서요

translation.en: GENTLEMEN.
- I'M PAYING YOU MILLIONS, AND YOU'RE TELLING ME I'M GONNA GET SCREWED?
translation.ko: 수십억을 받으면서 일을 이렇게 하는 거요?

translation.en: - JESSICA, HAVE I COME AT A BAD TIME?
translation.ko: 수십억을 받으면서 일을 이렇게 하는 거요? 제시카 들어가도 되겠습니까?

translation.en: - GERALD, THIS IS HARVEY SPECTER.
HE'S OUR BEST CLOSER.
- WELL, IF YOU'RE THE BEST CLOSER, WHERE THE HELL YOU BEEN FOR THE LAST THREE HOURS?
translation.ko: 최고의 마무리 투수님은 3시간 동안이나 어디 계셨소?

translation.en: - WELL, GERALD, I SPECIALIZE IN TROUBLED SITUATIONS,
translation.ko: 제럴드, 이런 일이 바로 제 전공입니다

translation.en: AND WHEN I LEFT HERE AT 7:00 P.M., THIS DEAL WASN'T IN JEOPARDY,
translation.ko: 퇴근할 때만 해도 위태로운 상황이 아니었어요

translation.en: SO I'M JUST TRYING TO FIGURE OUT WHAT HAPPENED IN THE INTERIM.
- WE KEEP OFFERING MORE MONEY. THEY KEEP REJECTING IT.
translation.ko: 더 많은 돈을 제시하는데 계속 거절하고 있소

translation.en: IT'S LAST-MINUTE BAD FAITH BULLSHIT.
translation.ko: 마지막 순간에 뒤통수를 치고 있는 거지

translation.en: - SAYS HERE THAT COOPER WON'T BE STAYING ON AS HONORARY VICE PRESIDENT.
translation.ko: 쿠퍼가 명예 부회장직에서 물러나겠다고 돼 있네요

translation.en: - THAT'S RIGHT. I DON'T WANT HIM AROUND.
- HE WOULDN'T BE AROUND. IT'S AN HONORARY POSITION.
- I DON'T GIVE A SHIT.
- WELL, I THINK YOU DO,
BECAUSE THAT'S WHAT'S CHANGED SINCE I LEFT,
translation.ko: 상관있어요 바뀐 건 그것뿐이에요 오히려 당신이 뒤통수를 치겠다는 거잖아요

translation.en: WHICH MEANS IT'S YOU WHO'S BEEN DEALING IN BAD FAITH.
- WELL, NOW THAT YOU'VE GOT A GRASP ON WHAT'S HAPPENED IN THE GODDAMN INTERIM,
WHAT ARE YOU GONNA DO ABOUT IT?
BECAUSE HE'S NOT GETTING THAT TITLE.
translation.ko: 난 어떤 명예직 자리도 주지 않을 거요

translation.en: - WELL, LET ME MAKE SURE I UNDERSTAND THIS, OKAY?
WE NEGOTIATED A DEAL THAT GAVE YOU EVERYTHING YOU WANTED,
MR. COOPER SIGNED IT, AND NOW YOU WON'T CLOSE
translation.ko: 쿠퍼의 서명까지 받았는데 그의 마지막 자존심까지 뺏어야겠다는 건가요?

translation.en: UNTIL WE TAKE AWAY THE LAST SHRED OF HIS DIGNITY?
- BINGO. - WELL, THAT'S NOT GONNA HAPPEN.
- AND WHY THE HELL NOT? - BECAUSE I LIKE MR. COOPER,
AND MY FIRM DOESN'T OPERATE IN BAD FAITH.
- OH. I SEE HOW IT IS.
INSTEAD OF WORKING COOPER, YOU'RE WORKING ME.
translation.ko: 자넨 쿠퍼와 일하는 게 아니라 나와 일하는 거요

translation.en: WELL, WHY DON'T YOU TAKE YOUR PANSY ATTITUDE BACK IN THERE AND MAKE HIM SIGN MY DEAL?
translation.ko: 계집애처럼 굴지 말고 서명이나 받아 오시지?

translation.en: OR I'LL PAY SOMEONE ELSE YOUR MONEY TO DO IT FOR ME.
translation.ko: 아니면 다른 놈에게 돈을 주고 시킬 테니까

translation.en: - FIRST OF ALL, GERALD,
IF YOU THINK ANYONE'S GONNA TOUCH THIS DEAL
translation.ko: 이런 짓을 해놓고도 다른 변호사를 찾을 수 있다고 생각하면 큰 착각입니다

translation.en: AFTER YOUR BAD FAITH, YOU'RE MISTAKEN.
translation.ko: 다른 변호사를 찾을 수 있다고 생각하면 큰 착각입니다

translation.en: SECOND, THE WAY OUR AGREEMENT WORKS IS,
THE MINUTE COOPER SIGNED THE DEAL WHICH GAVE YOU EVERYTHING YOU WANTED,
translation.ko: 쿠퍼 씨가 회사를 넘겨주도록 계약서에 서명하는 즉시

translation.en: OUR FEE WAS DUE AND PAYABLE, WHICH IS WHY AT 7:30
translation.ko: 수수료가 저희에게 입금되게 되어 있습니다 보시다시피 오늘 7시 30분에

translation.en: I RECEIVED CONFIRMATION OF A WIRE TRANSFER
translation.ko: 보시다시피 오늘 7시 30분에 예탁된 수수료 전부가 제 계좌로 이체됐습니다

translation.en: FROM ESCROW INDICATING PAYMENT IN FULL.
translation.ko: 예탁된 수수료 전부가 제 계좌로 이체됐습니다

translation.en: SO I'D SAY THE BALL'S IN YOUR COURT, BUT THE TRUTH IS YOUR BALLS ARE IN MY FIST.
translation.ko: 좋을 대로 하셔도 되지만 선택의 여지는 없네요

translation.en: NOW I APOLOGIZE IF THAT IMAGE IS TOO PANSY FOR YOU,
BUT I'M COMFORTABLE ENOUGH WITH MY MANHOOD TO PUT IT OUT THERE.
NOW GET YOUR ASS IN THERE AND CLOSE THE GODDAMN DEAL.
- YOU GONNA LET HIM TALK TO ME LIKE THIS?
- HARVEY SPEAKS FOR THE FIRM.
WE GOT PAID BEFORE GERALD SIGNED THE DEAL?
translation.ko: 제럴드가 사인도 하기 전에 수수료를 받는다고?

translation.en: - WHAT ARE YOU TALKING ABOUT? THIS IS A MEMO ABOUT SOME FIRE DRILL ON TUESDAY.
- HUH. - YOU'RE THE BLUE TEAM CAPTAIN. YOU GET TO WEAR A FIRE HAT.
translation.ko: 제시카는 블루 팀 대표라 소방관 모자를 써야 한답니다

translation.en: - TIME'S UP.
PENCILS DOWN.
EXCUSE ME. DO I KNOW YOU FROM SOMEWHERE?
translation.ko: 잠깐, 어디선가 본 적이 있는 것 같은데?

translation.en: - NO, I DON'T THINK SO. I HAVE A PRETTY GOOD MEMORY FOR FACES.
- SO DO I.
- SORRY. - I GOT IT.
HEY.
HEY, STOP! YOU IN THE CAP!
- WHAT DID YOU GET ME?
- WHAT I SAID I WAS GONNA GET YOU.
A 158. - I TOLD YOU I WANTED A 175.
- AND I TOLD YOU ONLY ONE OUT OF 100 PEOPLE CAN SCORE THAT.
translation.ko: 그런 점수는 1백 명 중 한 명뿐이라고 말했지

translation.en: YOU'RE A B-MINUS STUDENT. YOU GOT 1,000 ON YOUR SATs.
translation.ko: 네 성적은 B 마이너스고 SAT는 1천 점인데

translation.en: IF I GET YOU A 175, THEY'LL KNOW YOU CHEATED.
translation.ko: 네 성적은 B 마이너스고 SAT는 1천 점인데 175점이면 들통 날 점수라고

translation.en: - SO ONLY A GENIUS LOSER CAN GET A 175?
translation.ko: 너같이 잘난 놈만 175점을 받을 수 있다?

translation.en: - ( sighs ) ACTUALLY, NO. I WOULD GET A 180.
translation.ko: 너같이 잘난 놈만 175점을 받을 수 있다? 아니, 난 180까지 받아

translation.en: NOW CAN I HAVE MY MONEY, PLEASE?
- THEN WHY DON'T YOU GO CALL THE POLICE?
- ( groans ) I GOT TO GET MY SHIT TOGETHER.
- THAT'S THE BEST CHEESEBURGER I'VE HAD IN MY LIFE.
- IT'S FROM MONDAY, TREVOR.
LOOK, MAN, I'M SERIOUS. I ALMOST GOT CAUGHT TODAY.
translation.ko: 난 심각하다고 오늘은 거의 잡힐 뻔했어 약도 끊고 마음 잡아야 해

translation.en: I'VE GOT TO STOP GETTING STONED. I'VE GOT TO GET MY ACT TOGETHER.
translation.ko: 오늘은 거의 잡힐 뻔했어 약도 끊고 마음 잡아야 해

translation.en: - DUDE, LOOK AT ME. YOU CAN BURN BUD AND STILL BE A SUCCESS.
- YOU SELL POT FOR A LIVING.
- STILL SAPS THE MOTIVATION. ALL I'M SAYING IS, YOU WANT IN,
translation.ko: 말이 안 통하네 내 말은, 네가 원하기만 하면

translation.en: YOU ARE IN.
- YOU KNOW, THAT IS WORD FOR WORD YOUR OFFER BEFORE I GOT CAUGHT CHEATING ON YOUR MATH TEST IN THE THIRD GRADE.
translation.ko: 3학년 수학시험 대신 봐줄 때 네가 했던 말이야

translation.en: - GODDAMN MEMORY. - STOP.
- LOOK, NO ONE'S GONNA SUSPECT YOU'RE A DEALER.
translation.ko: 아무도 널 마약상으로 안 볼 거야

translation.en: I MEAN, LOOK AT ME. THIS IS A $2,000 SUIT, MIKE.
I GOT, LIKE, 12 OF 'EM.
translation.ko: 이런 게 열두 벌은 더 있어

translation.en: I TAKE ON REAL SOFTWARE PROJECTS.
I HAVE CLIENTS WHO BRING ME BRIEFCASES FILLED WITH CASH,
AND I HAND THEM IDENTICAL BRIEFCASES WITH VACUUM-SEALED BUD. I'M TELLING YOU, MAN, HIDE IN PLAIN SIGHT.
translation.ko: 난 똑같은 가방에 포장한 대마초를 담아주지

translation.en: - OKAY, SO WHAT DO YOU NEED ME FOR?
- WELL, I HAVE A CLIENT COMING IN FROM OUT OF TOWN,
AND I CAN'T MEET HIM,
AND I NEED SOMEONE I CAN TRUST TO MAKE THE DROP.
IT'S TOTALLY SAFE.
COME ON, HELP A BROTHER OUT.
- TREVOR, A PERSON IS MORE LIKELY TO DIE
translation.ko: 그러니까 좀 도와줘 텍사스에선 마약 운반하다 죽을 가능성이

translation.en: WHILE DEALING DRUGS THAN THEY WOULD BE ON DEATH ROW...
translation.ko: 텍사스에선 마약 운반하다 죽을 가능성이 사형수보다 높은 거 알지?

translation.en: IN TEXAS.
- WAIT. WHAT ARE YOU TALKING ABOUT?
- IT'S FROM FREAKONOMICS. DO YOU READ ANYTHING THAT I GIVE YOU?
translation.ko: 괴짜 경제학에 나오잖아 내가 준 거 하나라도 읽어?

translation.en: IT DOESN'T MATTER,
translation.ko: 상관없어 어차피 난 안 할 거야

translation.en: BECAUSE YOU HAVE TO FIND SOMEBODY ELSE. I'M NOT INTERESTED.
translation.ko: 상관없어 어차피 난 안 할 거야 난 관심 없어

translation.en: - NOT INTERESTED IN WHAT? - WHAT ARE YOU DOING HERE?
YOU SAID YOU WERE GONNA STAY AT YOUR PLACE TONIGHT.
translation.ko: 어쩐 일이야? 오늘은 너희 집에서 잔다며

translation.en: - HI, SWEETIE. WHAT A PLEASANT SURPRISE.
I'M SO GLAD YOU STOPPED BY. - YEAH.
WE'RE IN THE MIDDLE OF SOMETHING.
- WHAT ARE YOU IN THE MIDDLE OF?
- TREVOR'S TRYING TO SET ME UP.
- THAT'S TERRIFIC. UH, WHO'S THE-- THE LUCKY GIRL?
- I'M TRYING TO GET HIM TO WORK FOR ME.
- THAT'S A GREAT IDEA. IT WILL TAKE SOME STRESS OFF TREVOR,
AND YOU'LL PICK UP WRITING CODE LIKE YOU DO EVERYTHING ELSE.
translation.ko: 다른 거 잘하는 것만큼 프로그래밍 실력도 늘겠네

translation.en: - ALL RIGHT. I GOT TO GO.
I GOT GO GET UP EARLY TO SEE MY GRANDMOTHER AND PAY THEM ANOTHER MONTH.
translation.ko: 할머니 보러 가서 병원비도 내야 해

translation.en: - GOOD NIGHT. - BYE.
- HOW DID YOU KNOW GERALD WOULDN'T LOOK AT THAT MEMO?
translation.ko: 제럴드가 안 읽을 줄 어떻게 알았어?

translation.en: - BECAUSE A CHARGING BULL ALWAYS LOOKS AT THE RED CAPE, NOT AT THE MAN WITH THE SWORD.
translation.ko: 성난 소는 빨간 망토만 보지 투우사는 안 보이거든요

translation.en: - BY THE WAY, I'VE SET UP A MEETING
translation.ko: 성난 소는 빨간 망토만 보지 투우사는 안 보이거든요 존 도커리와 다음 주에 약속 잡아놨어

translation.en: FOR YOU AND JOHN DOCKERY NEXT WEEK.
translation.ko: 존 도커리와 다음 주에 약속 잡아놨어

translation.en: - DOCKERY? HE'S SKADDEN'S BIGGEST CLIENT.
translation.ko: 존 도커리와 다음 주에 약속 잡아놨어 도커리? 스케든의 최대 고객이잖아요

translation.en: - NOT ANYMORE. HE'S LOOKING AROUND.
HE WANTS US TO ASSESS WHERE HE'S VULNERABLE TO A TAKEOVER.
translation.ko: 이젠 아냐 눈을 돌리고 있어 테니스로 친해져 봐

translation.en: HE PLAYS TENNIS. I WANT YOU TO CLOSE HIM.
- CONSIDER IT DONE.
- THEN YOU ARE OFFICIALLY DISMISSED FOR THE EVENING. - CHEERS.
translation.ko: 그럼, 이제 오늘 일은 모두 끝났어

translation.en: - WELL, YOU TWO SEEM TO BE CELEBRATING SOMETHING.
- MM-HMM. WE ARE.
IN FACT, YOU ARE LOOKING AT THE BEST CLOSER THIS CITY HAS EVER SEEN.
- CLOSER, HUH?
BASEBALL? - ATTORNEY.
I CLOSE SITUATIONS.
- HMM. SO YOU ONLY CARE ABOUT MONEY?
- THE TRUTH IS, I DO IT FOR THE CHILDREN.
I'M LISA. - HARVEY.
LISA, I DON'T NORMALLY DO THIS,
BUT SINCE WE ARE CELEBRATING,
WHAT TIME DO YOU GET OFF TONIGHT?
translation.ko: 몇 시에 퇴근하는지 알 수 있을까요?

translation.en: - GLAD YOU ASKED.
I GET OFF AT TEN PAST "I'M NEVER GOING OUT WITH YOU."
- I GUESS YOU'RE NOT THE BEST CLOSER THIS CITY'S EVER SEEN.
translation.ko: 최고의 마무리 투수 되기는 아직 이른 것 같아

translation.en: - MORNING.
- LISA, THIS WAS LOVELY, BUT I'M AFRAID IT'S TIME TO GO.
- AW, CAN'T WE HANG OUT? I CAN MAKE YOU BREAKFAST.
- I HATE TO MISS A WORKOUT, AND I REALLY NEED TO BE IN THE OFFICE BY 7:30.
'CAUSE I WAS KIND OF THINKING
translation.ko: 안됐네요 내 배 위에 음식을 올려놓고 먹게 해줄까

translation.en: MAYBE YOU COULD EAT IT OFF MY STOMACH.
translation.ko: 내 배 위에 음식을 올려놓고 먹게 해줄까 생각하고 있었는데

translation.en: - I GUESS IF I SKIP THE GYM, I CAN STILL GET IN BY 9:00.
- I HEAR SOMEONE'S NOT TAKING THEIR PILLS.
- BECAUSE THEY'RE TRYING TO POISON ME.
- GRAMMY, THAT'S CRAZY.
DR. SHRAGER GAVE ME HER WORD SHE WOULDN'T POISON YOU UNTIL JANUARY.
IF SHE DOES IT BEFORE THEN, SHE CAN'T COUNT IT TOWARDS NEXT YEAR'S QUOTA.
translation.ko: 그래야 내년에 독살할 사람 수를 맞출 수 있대요

translation.en: OH, WHAT DID I TEACH YOU?
- MICHAEL, I'M NOT GONNA BE AROUND FOREVER.
translation.ko: 마이클, 내가 언제까지 네 곁에 있진 못할 거다

translation.en: AND I WANT YOU TO STOP WITH THAT STUFF.
- WHAT STUFF?
- I MAY BE OLD, BUT I'M NOT AN IDIOT.
I KNOW LIFE HAS BEEN HARD FOR YOU,
BUT YOU'RE NOT A KID ANYMORE,
AND I WANT YOU TO PROMISE YOU'RE GONNA START LIVING UP TO YOUR POTENTIAL.
- I PROMISE.
- I'M NOT SAYING THAT I HAVEN'T BEEN CHARMED BY HARVEY,
BUT IT'S JUST SO PATRONIZING
translation.ko: 하비가 능력 있단 건 알지만 그놈에겐 중요한 일을 맡기면서

translation.en: WHEN YOU SAY THAT HE CAN HANDLE THOSE THINGS
translation.ko: 그놈에겐 중요한 일을 맡기면서 저한텐 잡일만 하라고 하는 건 불공평하지 않습니까?

translation.en: AND, "LOUIS, YOU CAN ONLY HANDLE THIS."
translation.ko: 저한텐 잡일만 하라고 하는 건 불공평하지 않습니까?

translation.en: JESSICA, I COULD HAVE HANDLED GERALD TATE.
- AND I TOLD YOU I DISAGREE.
- WHY? - BECAUSE WHEN YOU PUT
translation.ko: -왜요? -왜냐면... 불같은 남자 둘이 붙으면 될 일도 안 되니까

translation.en: TWO BULLIES IN THE SAME ROOM TOGETHER, THINGS GENERALLY DON'T GO SO WELL.
translation.ko: 불같은 남자 둘이 붙으면 될 일도 안 되니까

translation.en: - IT'S 9:30. NICE OF YOU TO SHOW UP TWO HOURS AFTER WE OPEN FOR BUSINESS.
translation.ko: 9시 39분에야 나타났네 난 두 시간 전부터 일했는데

translation.en: AND I SEE THAT YOU'RE ALSO TRYING TO LOOK LIKE A PIMP.
- MY BAD, LOUIS. I WAS OUT LATE LAST NIGHT.
WHEN I WOKE UP, THIS IS THE SUIT
translation.ko: 미안해, 루이스 어제 늦게까지 놀았거든 아침에 깨보니 네 아내가 이 옷을 골라주더라

translation.en: YOUR WIFE PICKED OUT FOR ME.
translation.ko: 아침에 깨보니 네 아내가 이 옷을 골라주더라

translation.en: - AND THAT WOULD BE FUNNY IF I'D ACTUALLY BEEN MARRIED. - MOVING ALONG.
- YOU'RE NOT MARRIED? - RECRUITING. HARVEY.
YOUR INTERVIEWS ARE SET UP FOR TOMORROW.
translation.ko: -결혼 안 했어? -신입 채용 말이야, 하비 인터뷰는 내일로 잡았어

translation.en: - WHAT? WHY DON'T WE JUST HIRE THE HARVARD SUMMER ASSOCIATE DOUCHE?
translation.ko: 왜요? 하버드랑 제휴한 하계 인턴 갖다 쓰면 안 돼요?

translation.en: - I THINK IF YOU LISTEN TO THE PHRASING OF THAT QUESTION, YOU'LL COME UP WITH AN ANSWER.
translation.ko: 네 질문을 잘 생각해보면 답을 알 수 있을 것 같은데

translation.en: - WE NEED PEOPLE WHO THINK ON THEIR FEET,
translation.ko: 스스로 판단할 줄 아는 사람이 필요합니다

translation.en: NOT ANOTHER CLONE WITH A ROD UP HIS ASS.
- HARVEY, THE FACT THAT WE ONLY HIRE FROM HARVARD
translation.ko: 하비, 하버드 출신만 뽑는 건 다른 출신들을 쓰는 것보다

translation.en: GIVES US A CACHE THAT'S A LITTLE MORE VALUABLE
translation.ko: 하비, 하버드 출신만 뽑는 건 다른 출신들을 쓰는 것보다 차별화를 가져다준다고

translation.en: THAN HIRING A KID FROM RUTGERS.
- YOU WENT TO HARVARD LAW. - I'M AN EXCEPTION.
- FIND ME ANOTHER ONE.
- CAN WE PLEASE SKIP THE RECRUITING?
I WORK BETTER ALONE ANYWAY.
translation.ko: 안 뽑으면 안 될까요? 전 혼자 일하는 게 편한데

translation.en: - WELL, I WOULD, HARVEY, EXCEPT ALL SENIOR PARTNERS GET AN ASSOCIATE.
translation.ko: 알지만, 시니어 파트너들은 다 신입을 데리고 있어야 해

translation.en: IT'S JUST A RULE.
/- I'M SORRY, WHAT?
JESSICA, I DESERVE THAT PROMOTION.
MY BILLABLES DESTROY HIS.
translation.ko: 제시카 저도 승진할 자격 있어요 근무시간도 훨씬 길다고요

translation.en: AND I'M HERE NIGHT AND DAY DOING WHATEVER'S NEEDED
INSTEAD OF SWANNING IN AND OUT OF HERE WHENEVER I PLEASE.
- I MUST ADMIT, HE DOES MAKE ME SOUND VERY SWAN-LIKE.
- HARVEY, SHUT UP.
LOUIS, THIS IS HOW IT IS.
ALL RIGHT, NOW YOU TWO MAKE NICE.
- LOUIS, I APOLOGIZE. I WAS OUT OF LINE.
NOW IF YOU'LL JUST LET ME TEXT YOUR PRETEND WIFE THAT I JUST MADE SENIOR PARTNER, I--
translation.ko: 시니어 파트너가 됐다고 네 아내에게 알리기만 할게

translation.en: WHAT? TOO FAR?
translation.ko: 시니어 파트너가 됐다고 네 아내에게 알리기만 할게 너무한 건가? 존재하지도 않는 사람이잖아

translation.ko: -관심 없으니 마음 접으세요 -죄송해요, 그런 뜻은 아니었어요

translation.en: - TRUST ME. I'VE GIVEN DOZENS OF THESE,
translation.ko: 다 알아요 수십 번도 더 겪은 일이에요

translation.en: AND WITHOUT FAIL, WHATEVER NEW HOTSHOT IT IS THINKS THAT BECAUSE I'M JUST A PARALEGAL,
translation.ko: 촉망받는 인재들이고 난 일개 법률 보조니까

translation.en: THAT I WILL SOMEHOW BE BLOWN AWAY BY HIS DAZZLING DEGREE.
LET ME ASSURE YOU, I WON'T.
- I WAS. I WAS HITTING ON YOU.
- YOU WERE. TAKE NOTES.
I'M NOT GONNA REPEAT MYSELF.
translation.ko: 메모해요 두 번 설명 안 할 거예요

translation.en: - I LOVE YOU.
- EACH BANK OF OFFICES SPECIALIZES IN ITS OWN ARENA OF THE LAW
AND IS ANCHORED BY A DEPARTMENT HEAD ON EITHER END.
SO, ON OUR LEFT, MERGERS AND ACQUISITIONS.
ON THE OPPOSITE SIDE, HIGH NET WORTH DIVORCE.
- NICE! MERGERS ACROSS FROM DIVORCE. SYMMETRY.
translation.ko: 멋져요, 이혼 건너편이 합병이라니 대칭 관계네요

translation.en: AHEM, YEAH, I SHOULD JUST LISTEN.
- THE FIRM OPERATES ON A CHAIN OF COMMAND MODEL. HARVEY'S YOUR COMMANDING OFFICER.
HOWEVER, LOUIS LITT, HE OVERSEES ALL ASSOCIATES,
translation.ko: 명령체계는 엄격하고 하비가 직속상사지만 루이스 리트가 모든 신입을 관리하니까

translation.en: SO YOU'LL ALSO ANSWER TO HIM.
translation.ko: 루이스 리트가 모든 신입을 관리하니까 그분 지시도 받게 돼요

translation.en: - WHAT DO YOU THINK ABOUT HARVEY?
- PEOPLE ARE IN AWE OF HIM. THEY SAY HE'S THE BEST CLOSER THERE IS,
translation.ko: 사람들이 우러러보죠 최고의 마무리 투수라고도 하고

translation.en: BUT I HAVE VERY LITTLE CONTACT WITH HIM, SO I DON'T KNOW.
- AND WHAT ABOUT LOUIS LITT?
- LET'S CONTINUE WITH YOUR TOUR.
- HEY, BECKY. YOU ARE GLOWING.
I WONDER WHY THAT IS. OH, YEAH.
translation.ko: 베키, 오늘따라 빛이 나네 이유가 뭘까

translation.en: IT'S THE DAY THEY ANNOUNCE MY PROMOTION.
JIMMY, HAVE YOU LOST WEIGHT?
STEVE-O.
LOOKING LIKE A GUY WHO CAME TO WORK.
EXCUSE ME, WHY ARE YOU SCRATCHING OFF THE SENIOR OFF MY DOOR?
translation.ko: 잠시만요, 내 직책을 왜 긁어내고 있죠?

translation.en: - I GOT A WORK ORDER TO TAKE IT OFF.
- WHO ISSUED THE WORK ORDER? - MY SUPERVISOR.
- WHY DID HE ISSUE THE WORK ORDER?
- IF I KNEW THAT, I'D BE HIS SUPERVISOR.
- YOU SEEM TO BE ENJOYING YOURSELF.
translation.ko: 그걸 알면 내가 관리인이게요 즐거워 보이시네요

translation.en: - I HAVEN'T ENJOYED MYSELF SINCE 2004.
- DONNA!
SOMEONE'S TRYING TO HAVE A LITTLE FUN WITH ME HERE.
translation.ko: 도나 이 분이 장난치는 것 같은데

translation.en: - JESSICA WANTS TO SEE YOU IN HER OFFICE.
translation.ko: 이 분이 장난치는 것 같은데 제시카가 사무실로 오시래요

translation.en: NOW.
- AND FINALLY, THIS IS WHERE YOU'LL LIVE.
- I GAVE YOU THAT FOR A REASON. YOU HAVEN'T TAKEN ONE NOTE.
- THAT'S BECAUSE-- - BECAUSE YOU WERE
TOO BUSY OGLING ME TO LISTEN TO A WORD I'VE SAID?
translation.ko: 저 신경 쓰시느라 집중을 못 하셨나요?

translation.en: - PARTNERS' OFFICES ANCHOR THE WINGS.
FIFTH FLOOR'S RESEARCH, SIXTH IS SECURITY.
translation.ko: 파트너 사무실은 여길 운영하는 곳이고 5층은 자료보관실 6층은 보안구역

translation.en: ALL WORK GETS BILLED, EVEN IF IT'S FINDING AN ADDRESS.
translation.ko: 모든 업무는 청구하고 하다못해 주소 찾는 일도

translation.en: I ANSWER TO HARVEY AND LOUIS LITT,
translation.ko: 모든 업무는 청구하고 하다못해 주소 찾는 일도 하비와 루이스의 지시를 모두 받고

translation.en: AND, JUDGING BY THE WAY YOU RESPONDED TO MY QUESTIONS,
translation.ko: 또 내 질문에 대답한 걸로 봐서

translation.en: I SHOULD ADMIRE HARVEY AND I SHOULD FEAR LOUIS.
translation.ko: 또 내 질문에 대답한 걸로 봐서 하비는 존경하고 루이스는 겁내야겠고

translation.en: YOU HAVE BEEN HERE FOR FIVE YEARS,
AND JUST BECAUSE I OUTRANK YOU DOES NOT MEAN I HAVE THE AUTHORITY TO COMMAND YOUR SERVICES.
translation.ko: 내가 직책이 높다고 일을 시킬 권리는 없고

translation.en: OH, IT'S ALSO PRETTY CLEAR THAT YOU THINK YOU'RE TOO SMART
TO BE A PARALEGAL.
translation.ko: 법률 보조원 하기에는 머리가 아깝다는 거죠

translation.en: - YOU KNOW WHAT NOBODY LIKES?
NOBODY LIKES A SHOWOFF.
- YOU USED THE WORD "OGLING."
WHEN DO I GET TO SEE HARVEY?
- GERALD TATE FIRED THE FIRM.
- SO YOU'RE TAKING MY PROMOTION AWAY.
- YOU KNOW, MOST FIRMS WOULD PUT YOU IN FRONT OF THE BAR AND HAVE YOUR LICENSE STRIPPED.
translation.ko: 다른 회사였다면 법정에 세우고 자격을 박탈했을 거야

translation.en: YOU LIED TO A CLIENT, AND HE FIGURED IT OUT.
- I LIED TO HIM TO GET HIM TO DO THE RIGHT THING
translation.ko: 거짓말을 한 건 고객한테 옳은 일을 하고

translation.en: AND HONOR HIS GODDAMN CONTRACT.
AND YOU DIDN'T SEEM TO MIND SO MUCH
translation.ko: 계약을 존중하라고 그런 거죠 제가 빠져나갈 때는 신경 안 쓰시는 것 같더니

translation.en: WHEN YOU THOUGHT I GOT AWAY WITH IT.
translation.ko: 제가 빠져나갈 때는 신경 안 쓰시는 것 같더니

translation.en: - BUT YOU DIDN'T GET AWAY WITH IT.
translation.ko: 제가 빠져나갈 때는 신경 안 쓰시는 것 같더니 빠져나가지도 못했잖아

translation.en: AND I CAN'T JUSTIFY HANDING YOU A PROMOTION
translation.ko: 빠져나가지도 못했잖아 그렇게 큰 고객을 잃은 날 승진시킬 수는 없어

translation.en: ON THE SAME DAY THAT YOU LOSE A HUGE CLIENT.
translation.ko: 그렇게 큰 고객을 잃은 날 승진시킬 수는 없어

translation.en: - ONE CLIENT DOESN'T MAKE A FIRM.
- I DON'T KNOW IF YOU'VE NOTICED, BUT WE'RE IN THE MIDDLE OF AN ECONOMIC MELTDOWN.
COMPANIES AREN'T EXACTLY LINING UP TO SPEND MONEY ON ATTORNEYS RIGHT NOW.
translation.ko: 기업들이 변호사들 돈 주려고 줄 서지 않는다고

translation.en: AND, YOU KNOW, GERALD MIGHT HAVE FORGIVEN THE LYING HAD YOU NOT HUMILIATED HIM.
translation.ko: 제럴드에게 모욕감을 주지 않았으면 눈감아 줬을 거야

translation.en: BUT YOU DID, AND YOU NEED TO ACCEPT THAT.
- JESSICA, IF YOU HADN'T DONE AS MUCH FOR ME AS YOU HAVE,
I'D BE HEADING FOR THE DOOR.
- IF I HADN'T DONE AS MUCH FOR YOU AS I HAVE, I'D BE THROWING YOU OUT THE WINDOW.
translation.ko: 나야말로 진작에 창문 밖으로 던졌을 거야

translation.en: BUT, HARVEY, NO MORE SHENANIGANS.
YOU DO ONE MORE THING THAT ISN'T STRAIGHT AS AN ARROW,
translation.ko: 정도에 어긋나는 일을 한 번만 더했다간

translation.en: AND INSTEAD OF COVERING YOUR ASS, I WILL PUT YOU IN FRONT OF THE BAR MYSELF.
translation.ko: 뒤치다꺼리 안 하고 법정으로 끌고 갈 테니까

translation.en: - MIKE. - HEY. WHO'S READY FOR A GREAT FIRST DAY?
- I'M GONNA HAVE TO LET YOU GO. - WHAT?
- I JUST GOT REAMED FOR LYING TO A CLIENT,
translation.ko: 고객에게 거짓말한 거로 된통 깨지고 왔어

translation.en: AND IF THEY FIND OUT THAT I LIED ABOUT YOU GOING TO HARVARD, THEY'LL TAKE AWAY MY LICENSE.
translation.ko: 네 출신이 드러나면 자격정지를 당할 수도 있어

translation.en: - ( over intercom ) YOU WHAT?! - NOT NOW, DONNA.
LOOK, I HAVE TO PUT MY OWN INTERESTS ABOVE YOURS.
IT'S NOTHING PERSONAL. YOU'RE FIRED.
- WAIT, SO YOU'RE WORRIED THAT IF I STAY,
THEN THEY MIGHT FIND OUT THAT YOU LIED ABOUT ME
translation.ko: 잠깐만요 거짓말이 들통나면 자격을 잃을까 걱정하는 거죠?

translation.en: AND YOU'LL LOSE YOUR LICENSE.
BUT IF YOU FIRE ME, THEN I COULD TELL THEM
translation.ko: 자격을 잃을까 걱정하는 거죠? 절 해고하면 제가 폭로할 수도 있어요

translation.en: THAT YOU LIED ABOUT ME,
translation.ko: 절 해고하면 제가 폭로할 수도 있어요

translation.en: AND YOU'D DEFINITELY LOSE YOUR LICENSE.
translation.ko: 그러면 더 확실하게 자격을 잃으실 텐데요

translation.en: - ARE YOU TELLING ME THAT IF I THROW YOU UNDER THE BUS, YOU'RE GONNA DRAG ME WITH YOU?
translation.ko: 절벽에서 밀면 같이 안고 떨어지겠다는 거야?

translation.en: - YOU PUT YOUR INTERESTS ABOVE MINE, AND I'M JUST PUTTING MINE BACK UP NEXT TO YOURS.
translation.ko: 밥그릇부터 챙기셨듯이 저도 제 앞가림은 해야죠

translation.en: - YOU'RE REHIRED.
- SO SHOULD I... ALL RIGHT.
- HERE'S WHAT'S GONNA HAPPEN. YOU'RE GONNA GIVE ME BACK MY PROMOTION,
AND THAT'S THE LAST WE'RE GONNA TALK ABOUT THIS.
- AND WHY IS THAT?
- BECAUSE IF YOU DON'T, I'M GONNA GO ACROSS TOWN
translation.ko: 그렇게 하지 않으면 난 저쪽 동네에 있는

translation.en: AND JOIN RICK PETERSON.
I'M GONNA APPROACH EVERY CLIENT I'VE EVER CLOSED,
AND I'M GONNA TAKE THEM WITH ME.
- YOU DO THAT, AND YOU'LL FORCE ME TO PUT YOU IN FRONT OF THE ETHICS BOARD.
translation.ko: 그렇다면 윤리위원회에 회부 할 수밖에 없어

translation.en: - I DON'T THINK YOU WILL. - AND WHY NOT?
- BECAUSE YOU WERE OBLIGATED TO NOTIFY THEM THE SECOND I LIED TO GERALD, BUT YOU DIDN'T.
YOU PUT ME IN FRONT OF THE BOARD RIGHT NOW, I'LL PUT YOU RIGHT UP THERE WITH ME.
translation.ko: 절 위원회에 세운다면 같이 서야 할 겁니다

translation.en: I'LL... I'LL GIVE YOU YOUR PROMOTION.
BUT YOU HAVE TO DO SOMETHING FOR ME.
- ANYTHING.
- ANYTHING BUT THAT.
- HARVEY, PRO BONO CASES ARE HOW WE, AS A FIRM, SHOW THAT WE CARE ABOUT MORE THAN JUST OURSELVES.
translation.ko: 무료 변호로 회사 이익만 따지지 않는단 걸 보여줘

translation.en: - I'M NOT SAYING WE SHOULDN'T DO THEM. I'M SAYING I SHOULDN'T DO THEM.
translation.ko: 하지 말자는 게 아닙니다 제가 할 필요가 없다는 거죠

translation.en: - AND IT'S HOW YOU CAN SHOW ME THAT YOU CARE ABOUT MORE THAN JUST YOURSELF.
translation.ko: 네가 이기적이지 않다는 걸 보여줄 수도 있어

translation.en: YOU'LL HANDLE THIS YOURSELF. YOU WILL NOT PASS IT OFF.
- ABSOLUTELY.
- YOUR FIRST CASE. - AWESOME. WHAT IS IT?
- PRO BONO. SEXUAL HARASSMENT.
DON'T TELL ANYONE I LAID IT OFF ON YOU,
translation.ko: 무료 상담인데 성희롱 관련 사건이야 내가 시켰다는 건 비밀이야

translation.en: AND DON'T SCREW IT UP. - GOT IT.
YOU CAN'T HANDLE IT?
I'LL KNOCK IT OUT OF THE PARK.
- EASY, CLARENCE THOMAS. JUST GO MEET THE CLIENT.
HEY. DIDN'T I TELL YOU TO GET SOME BETTER SUITS?
translation.ko: 더 괜찮은 걸로 입고 오라고 했을 텐데?

translation.en: - I SPENT $500.
- FOR HOW MANY SUITS? - FIVE.
WHAT?
- NANCY?
- MIKE? - YEAH, HI.
- YOU'RE A KID.
- NO, I'M A-- I'M A GROWN MAN.
- YOU'RE SO SKINNY. DO THEY FEED YOU? HERE, HAVE A GRAPE.
- THANK YOU.
WHY DON'T YOU TELL ME YOUR STORY?
- IT STARTED TWO YEARS AGO.
I WAS A STAY-AT-HOME MOM TO MY SON, FREDDIE.
AND ONE DAY WE WERE AT LITTLE LEAGUE-- FREDDIE WAS FIVE, AND HE REALLY HATED
translation.ko: 프레디가 5살 때 야구 대회를 나가게 됐는데

translation.en: THAT HE COULDN'T PLAY WITH THE OLDER KIDS--
IT WAS THE THIRD INNING, AND I GOT A PHONE CALL.
MY HUSBAND HAD BEEN IN A CAR ACCIDENT,
translation.ko: 남편이 차 사고를 당했는데 세상을 떠났다고요

translation.en: AND HE WAS GONE, JUST LIKE THAT.
translation.ko: 남편이 차 사고를 당했는데 세상을 떠났다고요 믿을 수가 없었죠

translation.en: - I'M SO SORRY.
- I DID THE BEST I COULD. I GOT MYSELF A JOB AS A SECRETARY
AT DEVLIN MCGREGGOR.
AND I EVEN GOT PROMOTED TO SECRETARY OF THE PRESIDENT, CHARLES HUNT.
translation.ko: 승진해서 찰스 헌트란 사장의 비서가 됐어요

translation.en: AND THAT'S WHEN IT ALL CHANGED.
- IT'S OKAY. TELL ME WHAT HAPPENED.
- HE STARTED ASKING ME TO STAY LATE,
ORDER IN DINNERS TOGETHER, STUFF LIKE THAT.
translation.ko: 야근을 시키기 시작했죠 같이 저녁을 먹기도 했고

translation.en: ONE NIGHT, HE SAYS THAT IF I SLEEP WITH HIM, HE'S GONNA TAKE CARE OF ME IN THE FIRM,
translation.ko: 하루는 자기와 같이 자면 회사에서 잘 봐줄 거고

translation.en: AND, IF I DON'T, HE'S GONNA FIRE ME.
- SO WHAT DID YOU DO?
- I WENT TO HUMAN RESOURCES.
THEY SAID THEY INVESTIGATED,
COULDN'T FIND ANYTHING TO SUPPORT MY CLAIM.
translation.ko: 제 주장에 대한 어떤 근거도 없대요

translation.en: TWO MONTHS LATER, I WAS FIRED FOR POOR JOB PERFORMANCE.
translation.ko: 두 달 뒤 업무실적이 나쁘다며 해고당했어요

translation.en: THEY WOULDN'T LET ME SAY GOOD-BYE TO ANYBODY. THEY WOULDN'T WRITE ME A LETTER OF RECOMMENDATION.
translation.ko: 작별인사도 못 하게 하더군요 추천장도 써주질 않았어요

translation.en: I WASN'T LOOKING FOR A PAYOFF.
translation.ko: 작별인사도 못 하게 하더군요 추천장도 써주질 않았어요 돈을 바라는 게 아니에요

translation.en: ALL I WANTED WAS FOR IT TO STOP.
CAN YOU HELP ME?
- UH, YES. YES, I CAN.
- WHAT DO YOU NEED MY HELP FOR?
- WAIT, CAN I JUST-- - NO, GIVE ME THE UPDATE.
- YOU KNOW, SHE'S A NICE WOMAN. SHE-- - ON THE CASE.
translation.ko: -그 여자 정말 착한 사람이에요 -사건 얘기만 해

translation.en: I DON'T GET EMOTIONALLY ATTACHED TO THE CLIENT.
translation.ko: 난 의뢰인의 감정에 마음 쓰지 않아

translation.en: - THIS WOMAN HAD HER LIFE RIPPED APART. YOU DON'T EVEN CARE?
translation.ko: 인생이 산산이 조각났어요 그래도 신경 안 써요?

translation.en: - I'M NOT ABOUT CARING. I'M ABOUT WINNING.
- WHY CAN'T YOU BE ABOUT BOTH?
translation.ko: 난 이기는 것만 신경 써 의뢰인도 신경 써주면 안 돼요?

translation.en: - I'D EXPLAIN IT TO YOU, BUT THEN I'D HAVE TO CARE ABOUT YOU.
translation.ko: 이유를 설명해주고 싶지만 신경 쓰는 일이 될 테니 관둘래

translation.en: - RIGHT.
translation.ko: 이유를 설명해주고 싶지만 신경 쓰는 일이 될 테니 관둘래 알겠어요

translation.en: WHAT ARE YOU DOING? DON'T TOUCH THAT.
- I'M JUST CHECKING MY LOCK.
- YOU RIDE YOUR BIKE TO...
IT'S LOCKED, OKAY?
COME ON.
- DEFENSE SENT OVER THE INVESTIGATION FILES
translation.ko: 피고 측은 예의상 조사자료를 보냈다고 했어요

translation.en: AS A COURTESY. - NO, THEY DIDN'T.
translation.ko: 피고 측은 예의상 조사자료를 보냈다고 했어요 아니, 예의상 보내주는 건 없어

translation.en: NOBODY DOES ANYTHING AS A COURTESY.
THEY SENT THOSE FILES
translation.ko: 자료를 보낸 건 그냥 읽으라고 보내준 거야

translation.en: BECAUSE THAT'S WHERE THEY WANT YOU TO LOOK.
translation.ko: 자료를 보낸 건 그냥 읽으라고 보내준 거야 변호사가 된다는 건 의사가 되는 것과 같아

translation.en: LISTEN, BEING A LAWYER'S LIKE BEING A DOCTOR.
translation.ko: 변호사가 된다는 건 의사가 되는 것과 같아

translation.en: - YOU MEAN HOW YOU DON'T GET EMOTIONAL ABOUT THE CLIENT?
translation.ko: 고객의 마음에 신경 쓰면 안 된단 말이죠?

translation.en: - NO, I MEAN YOU KEEP PRESSING UNTIL IT HURTS. THEN YOU KNOW WHERE TO LOOK.
translation.ko: 아니, 아플 때까지 찔러 봐 그래야 고칠 곳을 알지

translation.en: FORGET ABOUT IMPEACHING THE INVESTIGATION.
translation.ko: 조사자료 따윈 잊어 아무 쓸모 없어

translation.en: IT WON'T LEAD ANYWHERE. NO EMPLOYEE'S GONNA TESTIFY
translation.ko: 조사자료 따윈 잊어 아무 쓸모 없어 자기 사장에게 불리한 증언을 할 직원은 없어

translation.en: AGAINST THEIR OWN CEO. - OKAY.
translation.ko: 자기 사장에게 불리한 증언을 할 직원은 없어 어떻게 하면 될까요?

translation.en: SO WHAT DO YOU SUGGEST I DO?
- THINK. THIS GUY'S DONE THIS ONCE...
translation.ko: 생각해 봐 이런 짓을 저지른 놈은

translation.en: - HE'S DONE IT BEFORE.
- AND IF THE PEOPLE WHO WORK FOR HIM NOW WON'T TESTIFY AGAINST HIM...
- SOMEONE WHO USED TO WORK FOR HIM MIGHT.
translation.ko: 전에 일했던 사람들은 해줄 수도 있겠죠

translation.en: - YOU KNOW WHAT, I'D SUBPOENA THE PERSONNEL RECORDS
OF EVERY WOMAN WHO'S LEFT THE FIRM DURING THIS GUY'S TENURE. - THAT'S FUNNY.
translation.ko: 회사를 떠난 여직원 기록 전부를 소환할 거야

translation.en: THAT'S EXACTLY WHAT I THOUGHT.
- THEN WHAT DO YOU NEED MY HELP FOR?
- I DON'T KNOW HOW TO FILL OUT A SUBPOENA.
- BY THE WAY, DID YOU GET HER TO SIGN THE ENGAGEMENT LETTER? - ( scoffs ) YEAH.
WHAT'S AN ENGAGEMENT LETTER?
- IT'S A PIECE OF PAPER THAT KEEPS HER FROM BEING ABLE TO SUE US.
DONNA, CAN YOU SHOW ME HOW TO FILL OUT A SUBPOENA?
translation.ko: 도나, 출석요구서 쓰는 법 좀 가르쳐 주세요

translation.en: - ABSOLUTELY. AND AFTER THAT, YOU WANT ME TO SHOW YOU HOW TO WIPE YOUR ASS?
translation.ko: 그럼요, 그다음엔 엉덩이 닦는 것도 가르쳐 줄게요

translation.en: - IT'S FUNNY, BECAUSE YOU SHOULD ALREADY KNOW HOW TO DO BOTH THOSE THINGS.
translation.ko: 그 정도 나이면 둘 다 할 줄 알아야 할 텐데

translation.en: - HA, YEAH, THAT'S HILARIOUS.
WHAT'S THAT? - THAT'S MY SUIT GUY.
GO IN, TELL HIM I SENT YOU, AND SPEND SOME MONEY.
translation.ko: 내가 보냈다고 말하고 지갑 좀 열고 와

translation.en: - WHAT DOES IT MATTER HOW MUCH MONEY I SPEND ON SUITS?
- PEOPLE RESPOND TO HOW WE'RE DRESSED, SO LIKE IT OR NOT, THIS IS WHAT YOU HAVE TO DO.

- OKAY. SO JUST ONE QUESTION. WHY'D YOU GO TO JOANNA'S HOUSE?
translation.ko: 물어볼 게 있어요 조애나 집에는 왜 가신 거예요?

translation.en: - BECAUSE I FIGURED IT OUT. - I OBJECT.
I THINK YOU DID IT BECAUSE YOU CARE.
translation.ko: 아닌 것 같은데요 절 신경 쓰시는 거죠?

translation.en: - I DID IT BECAUSE IT'S MY JOB.
- WOULD YOU ADMIT IT? YOU CARE ABOUT ME.
I SAW YOU SMILE WHEN I SHOWED UP FOR WORK THIS MORNING.
- I DIDN'T SMILE. I WAS THINKING OF A FUNNY JOKE.
LOOK, WE START ON THIS TOMORROW.
- DOES THIS MEAN WE'RE OFFICIALLY A TEAM NOW?
translation.ko: 이거나 봐 내일부터 시작할 거야 공식적으로 한팀이란 말이죠?

translation.en: - I WOULDN'T MOVE YOUR THINGS INTO WAYNE MANOR JUST YET.
translation.ko: 웨인의 저택으로 네 물건을 옮기지도 않았잖아

translation.en: - SO NOW YOU'RE BATMAN? - CLOSER TO HIM THAN CLEMENZA.
- OH, YEAH, KILMER. - CLOONEY.
both: KEATON.
- DID YOU REALLY QUIT WHEN YOU FIRST STARTED?
- OF COURSE NOT. I'M NOT A WUSS.
translation.ko: 물론 아니지 너 같은 겁쟁이는 아니니까
